title: Supermarkets, banks, cars set ablaze: Mexico cartel goes on revenge spree after El Mencho killed
summary_full: Mexico experienced a coordinated wave of retaliation following the killing of feared cartel boss El Mencho. Gunmen loyal to the CJNG leader blocked highways and torched businesses, disrupting air travel and prompting residents to seek shelter. This show of force, described as revenge, highlights the ongoing challenges of cartel violence in the country.
